Okay, I admit that the post was a lot bit farfetched and illegal too... 
Well, this is my first official mode in the game!! The fact is, though, that 
a techno-organic base can not survive on organic matter. So, could I instead 
reformat a part of australia (an area sufficient for a base, ie)?

PS: Screw the Shadow Destiny post, I'll remake it later!
